title: Binning Metagenomic Sequences Using Convex Hulls
content: A novel metagenomic binning tool using convex hull distance-based unsupervised clustering, accompanied by a Python-based CLI/Web tool, developed as part of the final year project.
Research Publication:

S. Chandrasiri, T. Perera, A. Dilhara, I. Perera, and V. Mallawaarachchi, “Ch-bin: A convex hull based approach for binning metagenomic contigs,” Computational Biology and Chemistry, vol. 100, p. 107734, 2022.
Conference: The 20th Asian Pacific Bioinformatics Conference 2022
DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.compbiolchem.2022.107734
Research Paper Link
Github Repository

title: Theme Provider - Flutter Package
content: An easy to use, customizable Theme Provider plugin for Flutter.
This provides app color schemes throughout the app and automatically rebuilds the UI dynamically.
This can also persist the current color theme.
This package provides several widgets that can help to easily add theme switching abilities.
Package Home Page (Dart Pub)
Github Repository
Online Demo Site

title: Ballerina Shell
content: A REPL program for the ballerina language. Ballerina is an open source programming language and platform for cloud-era application programmers to easily write software that just works.
This is tool developed as an intern project at WSO2, and this project was later merged in to the official ballerina language repository.
Ballerina Lang Repository
Original Github Repository

title: Rise of the Pharaohs Scavenger hunt app
content: Scavenger-hunt mobile app developed using Flutter and Firebase which was created as the invitation for the CSE event – Rise of the Pharaohs.
Showcase Video
Visit Scavenger App Repository
Visit AR App Repository

title: Tic Tac Toe Playing Robot Arm
content: This was a vision based approach to developing a tic-tac-toe playing robot using Arduino and OpenCV
This robot operates in 2 separate modules.
An android app is used to identify the positions of balls (This version of tic-tac-toe uses green and red balls) on the board.
The app then instructs the Arduino board to take the move (The move is calculated using minimax algorithm).
Then the arduino module uses the arm to play the turn.
This bot was able to win the runners-up position in XOBot Competition and this bot lost the final round by mere 3 seconds.
Demo Video

title: Java Based RPAL Interpreter
content: RPAL interpreter implemented in Java which evaluates RPAL abstract syntax trees according to the RPAL grammar specification.
Developed as part of the CS3152 - Programming Languages module.
Github Repository

title: Java Based WinZig Compiler
content: Compiler that generates assembly code for the specified abstract machine for programs written in WinZig language.
Developed as part of the CS4542 - Compiler Design module.
Github Repository

title: Classification of anomalies in gastrointestinal tract through endoscopic imagery with transfer learning
content: Transfer Learning project done for the university module which uses transfer learning with pre-trained models such as inception, densenet, resnet34 in order to correctly detect the anomaly.
Github Repository

title: Teleport Mobile App
content:
Teleport is an app which intends to use concepts of sharing economy in order to further transportation and logistics industry. 
This app was made using flutter and supports both iOS and android platforms.

title: OS Scheduler Algorithm Simulator
content: This is a simple web app/electron app to simulate the OS scheduler algorithms such as Round Robin/SJF/FCFS/SRTF.
Uses canvas drawings and charts to demonstrate various statistics related to simulation.
This was a project done for semester 3 module Operating Systems (17-S3-CS2042)
Github Repository
Online Test Site

title: Piano Tiles Bot - Open Source Project
content: A hobby project I did which captures a window from an emulator and uses openCV to process the image and press according keys.
This bot was intended to play piano tiles game and can reach 4000+ scores easily.
Github Repository
